sen.j: 三野乙益（みののおとます)は奈良時代の人。
sen.e: MINO no Otomasu was a person of Nara period.
MINO no Otomasu was a person of the Nara period.
MINO no Otomasu was a person of the Nara period.

sen.j: 備前国高津郡津高郷の人。
sen.e: He lived in Tsudaka village, Takatsu County, Bizen Province.
He lived in Tsudaka village, Takatsu County, Bizen Province.
He lived in Tsudaka village, Takatsu County, Bizen Province.

sen.j: 宝亀5年11月に同郷の漢部阿古麻呂から畑3段を購入した。
sen.e: In December 774, he purchased a field of 2975.1 square meters from ayabe (people managed by ayahito [people from China who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese]) in the same village, named Akomaro.
sen.cmt: 「阿古麻呂」の読み方不明ですが、 "Akomaro" としました。
sen.e: In December 774, he purchased a field of 2975.1 square meters from ayabe (people managed by ayahito [people from China who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese]) in the same village, named Akomaro.

In December 774, he purchased a field of 2975.1 square meters from ayabe (people managed by ayahito [people from China who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese]) in the same village, named Akomaro.
